author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
We need more mascots on Linux but one of the major mascots we do have is known as Larry the Cow from the Gentoo project and today I wanted to talk a bit about where Larry came from and a funny issue report along the way.

title: They Disrespected Linux's Biggest Cow
